hadiths.text: Narrated Abdullah ibn Amr ibn al-'As: A man came to the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) and said: I came to you to take the oath of allegiance to you on emigration, and I left my parents weeping. He (the Prophet) said: Return to them and make them laugh as you made them weep

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الرَّجُلِ يَغْزُو وَأَبَوَاهُ كَارِهَانِ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding A Man Who Goes To Battle While His Parents Object
